title: Hospitality Practical Competency Enhancement: Reinforcement Learning-Based Droplet Microfluidics Design Masterclass

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic calculus and fluid mechanics concepts, no programming experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: The fundamental principles and application cases of droplet microfluidics can be explained.
The process of designing microfluidic networks using reinforcement learning algorithms can be implemented step-by-step
An optimal microfluidic network topology that meets given functional requirements (e.g., droplet sorting) can be proposed

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
